content: The problem you describe is nothing to do with reusing the branch name
It's because you need to git fetch; git merge origin/master after the first branch is merged

Eric Wieser said:

It's because you need to git fetch; git merge origin/master after the first branch is merged

That works, thanks!
Felix Weilacher has marked this topic as resolved.

Eric Wieser said:

It's because you need to git fetch; git merge origin/master after the first branch is merged

Does this work even as PR branches get deleted after merge?
It should work as long as the branch isn't deleted locally.
